body.p: An entity shall recognise income and expenses for the following changes in the carrying amount of the liability for incurred claims:

li.p: insurance service expenses—for the increase in the liability because of claims and expenses incurred in the period, excluding any investment components;
insurance service expenses—for any subsequent changes in fulfilment cash flows relating to incurred claims and incurred expenses; and
insurance finance income or expenses—for the effect of the time value of money and the effect of financial risk as specified in paragraph 87.
